inclusion.criterion: hyperglycaemia (≥ 8.0 mmol/l) admitted to the medical emergency room
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: presumed hospitalisation in ER or medical ward of more than 48 h duration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: type 1 diabetes with or without ketoacidosis
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: require intensive care unit (ICU) or cardial care unit (CCU) therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes who has been hospitalized previously for diabetic ketoacidosis. He presents to the emergency room with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis after not taking his insulin for 3 days.
